Detailed Description

The ScanlineAccessor is used to draw a scanline on a display in a fast way by setting the RGB-values for each pixel.

void ScanlineAccessor::Next (   )  [inline]
 

Advances the internal data by one. Use this if you need to skip a call to Draw (e.g. because of a transparent pixel). Does the the same thing as Draw without actually drawing.

void ScanlineAccessor::Next (   )  [inline]
